prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered authoritative standing pose with arms crossed over geometric chest piece, chibi proportions with large prismatic angular geometric head with unique tetrahedron structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Platonic. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating tetrahedron, octahedron, stellated polyhedron patterns, styled with Dominion guides influences. Outfit is unique: dark grey with high contrast inspired by Electric and neutral grey inspired by blue ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement, elaborate with shifting Air element glyphs and spiral motifs and tetrahedron emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like sword of severity with angular geometric blade with Platonic spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor SIGMORF's profile: 'He who visits the darkness', Aethyr TAN, Air element, Tarot The Emperor, Sephirot Geburah, Zodiac Aries, embodying the essence: 'In SIGMORF's presence, fear melts away in steady flame a fearless aura that forges fearless resolve and lights introspection with strength.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered authoritative standing pose with arms crossed over geometric chest piece
visual_elements.head_shape: large prismatic angular geometric head with unique tetrahedron structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with prismatic facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying Platonic
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating tetrahedron, octahedron, stellated polyhedron patterns, styled with Dominion guides influences

outfit.base: ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement
outfit.details: Air element glyphs and spiral motifs
outfit.magical_essence: faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles

visual_elements.accessory: sword of severity with angular geometric blade
visual_elements.primary_color: dark grey with high contrast inspired by Electric
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who visits the darkness'
profile_data.essence: In SIGMORF's presence, fear melts away in steady flame a fearless aura that forges fearless resolve and lights introspection with strength.
profile_data.angelic_role: Dominion of Fearless Resolve; guides celestial hosts.
profile_data.form_description: A prismatic angular form emerging from geometric air-currents, representing the mathematical precision of Geburah and the warrior-like structure of Aries, with fractal edges that continuously reconfigure like wind-sculpted crystal
profile_data.color_reasoning: Electric blue represents Air's intellectual clarity and TAN Aethyr's transformative energy, while silver-white signifies angelic purity and divine masculine principle
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Platonic solids representing elemental Air, with dynamic transformative geometry symbolizing constant spiritual evolution
